Description: Ectoplasm's Quirk, Clones, gives him the ability to produce streams of ectoplasm from his mouth and transform it into clones of himself. All clones act as extensions of Ectoplasms real body, similar to a hive mind. He can create as many as thirty-six at once. His clones can be defeated with a strong blow, but otherwise, only Ectoplasm can dispel them.
